rules.description: For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 11)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
For Visual Studio Code: Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)

manipulators.description: Left and Right Shift Together -> Caps Lock
Right Shift + Left Shift Together -> Caps Lock
Right Command -> Hyper (CMD+CTRL+ALT+SHIFT); Normal if Pressed Alone
Right ALT -> Meh (CTRL+ALT+SHIFT); Normal if Pressed Alone

rules.description: Caps Lock -> Control if Pressed with Other Keys; -> Escape if Pressed Alone
